import React from "react"; import { Btn } from './Button'; class DetailsHero extends React.Component { render() { this.props.value.matches[0].params.id; const productKey = this.props.boxs[0].image.split("/")[2].split(".")[0]; const findKey = this.props.boxs.find(el => el.image.includes(productKey)); // console.log(findKey) console.log(productKey) return (
{ findKey.price }

{ findKey.name }

{ findKey.description }

color: pink
); } } export default DetailsHero;
